word: Before You Start
We recommend performing a site visit prior to installing ButterflyMX hardware to determine what additional ButterflyMX or
third-party hardware may be required. A site visit is required if Wi-Fi is the only planned internet connection method.
For pre-installation questions on connectivity, contact SolutionsArchitecture@butterflymx com
